domain.update.contracts

Interface IBasicUpdateSource

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAction, IBasicUpdateProcessor, IUpdateProcessor, IUpdateSource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionInput, ActionPromotion, AtomicAction, AtomicActionCatch, AtomicActionStep, BasicUpdateProcessor, BasicUpdateSource, CompositeAction, CompositeActionFly, CompositeActionFlyCatch, ForcedRemiseObserver, GameController, InputProvider, OutOfMovesObserver, PromotionObserver, RemiseInput, ResignInput, UpdateProcessor, UpdatePropagator, UpdateSource

    public interface IBasicUpdateSource
    Provides a basic interface for every class that wants to accept IBasicObservers and send them updates.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isSubscribedBasic(IBasicObserver observer)
      Returns true if the given observer is already subscribed, false otherwise.
      void subscribeBasic(IBasicObserver observer)
      Subscribe an observer to receive future updates about the game.
      void unsubscribeBasic(IBasicObserver observer)
      Unsubscribe an observer to stop receiving updates about the game.

    • Method Detail

      • subscribeBasic

        void subscribeBasic(IBasicObserver observer)
        Subscribe an observer to receive future updates about the game.
        Parameters:
        observer - The observer that will receive updates.

      • unsubscribeBasic

        void unsubscribeBasic(IBasicObserver observer)
        Unsubscribe an observer to stop receiving updates about the game.
        Parameters:
        observer - The observer to unsubscribe.

      • isSubscribedBasic

        boolean isSubscribedBasic(IBasicObserver observer)
        Returns true if the given observer is already subscribed, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        observer - The observer to check
